<a href="https://learn.electric.ai/soundbar-morning-brew/?utm_source=morning_brew&utm_medium=paid_affiliate&utm_campaign=soundbar_01212021" style="border-bottom:none!important;" target="_blank" class=""><img alt="Electric" style="width:100%;max-width: 124px; display: inline; vertical-align: middle;" width="124" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL2NvbXBhbnkvbG9nby8yMTgvMTU5NDc0NzE0Ni1XaGl0ZV9CYWNrZ3JvdW5kX18yXy5wbmciLCJidWNrZXQiOiJjb21ldC1tb3JuaW5nYnJldyIsImVkaXRzIjp7InJlc2l6ZSI6eyJ3aWR0aCI6MTAwMCwiaGVpZ2h0IjpudWxsfX19"></a>

<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding-top:20px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Good morning. </strong>Not many people can upstage Lady Gaga, J.Lo, or a new president. But 22-year-old poet Amanda Gorman managed to steal the show at the inauguration with her transfixing poem, “The Hill We Climb.”</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Here’s an excerpt:</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><em>Let the globe, if nothing else, say this is true:<br></em><em>That even as we grieved, we grew<br></em><em>That even as we hurt, we hoped<br></em><em>That even as we tired, we tried<br></em><em>That we’ll forever be tied together, victorious<br></em><em>Not because we will never again know defeat<br></em><em>but because we will never again sow division</em></p>
</td>

</th>

<div class="c6 " style="margin-bottom:7px">
<!-- <![endif]-->
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
GOVERNMENT
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/01/20/president-bidens-first-day-proclamations-aplenty?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
Did Biden Discover Nitro Cold Brew?
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<img alt="Biden inaugurated" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL21lZGl1bS9hc3NldC8zNzgyL2JpZGVuX2luYXVndXJhdGVkLmpwZyIsImJ1Y2tldCI6Im9zbG8tcHJvZHVjdGlvbiIsImVkaXRzIjp7InJlc2l6ZSI6eyJ3aWR0aCI6MTAwMCwiaGVpZ2h0IjpudWxsfX19">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>SAUL LOEB/POOL/AFP via Getty Images</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Because he had a very productive Wednesday. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Just before noon, former Vice President Joe Biden <a href="https://apnews.com/article/joe-biden-inauguration-a01d1ffa7862661914cb92b22e359854?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">shaved</a> the “former” and “Vice” off that title when he was sworn in as the 46th President of the US. </p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Former Senator Kamala Harris made history as the first-ever woman, African American, and South Asian American to become VP. </span></li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">After the ceremony, Biden got <a href="https://www.cbsnews.com/news/biden-executive-orders-watch-live-stream-today-2021-01-20/?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">right to work</a>. And like Hogwarts or a cow’s stomach, his first day was segmented into four parts. </p>
<h2 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0">No. 1: Containing Covid </h2>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">In an executive order, Biden mandated mask-wearing and physical distancing in federal buildings, on federal land, and by all federal employees.</p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>He also halted former President Trump’s efforts to leave the World Health Organization. </span></li>
</ul>
<h2 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0">No. 2: Containing the economic fallout from Covid </h2>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Biden extended a federal moratorium on evictions and asked the relevant agencies to do the same for foreclosures on federally guaranteed mortgages. Americans with student loan debt also won’t owe principal or interest through the end of September. </p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Some in Biden’s Democratic Party want him to erase up to $50,000 per person in student debt, but Biden’s team has maintained a goal of canceling up to $10,000. </span></li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Biden also froze last-minute regulations enacted by Trump so that his administration can evaluate whether they’ll keep them. </p>
<h2 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0">No. 3: Reversing Trump’s policies on immigration </h2>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Biden <a href="https://www.cbsnews.com/news/biden-executive-orders-watch-live-stream-today-2021-01-20/?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">ordered</a> an end to construction of the border wall while the administration studies its legal status and called on Congress to defend the “Dreamers” program for undocumented Americans, a program Trump targeted. </p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Biden also ended the travel ban targeting Muslim-majority countries. </span></li>
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>Biden’s broader immigration platform involves creating a </span><span><a href="https://www.latimes.com/california/story/2021-01-20/biden-administration-releases-bill-establishing-pathway-to-citizenship-for-11-million-undocumented-immigrants?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">path to citizenship</a></span><span> for an estimated 11 million people. </span>
</li>
</ul>
<h2 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0">No. 4: Combating climate change </h2>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Biden signed a letter indicating that the US will rejoin the Paris Agreement, which Trump had pulled out of. He also <a href="https://www.nytimes.com/2021/01/20/us/politics/biden-executive-action.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">took action</a> on other environmental efforts by 1) overturning softer standards on emissions 2) imposing a moratorium on oil and gas leases in the Arctic National Wildlife Refuge and 3) revoking a permit for the Keystone XL pipeline. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Looking ahead...</strong>we see push notifications in your future. White House Press Secretary Jen Psaki said there would be more proclamations over the next 10 days.</p>

<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
SOCIAL MEDIA
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/01/20/official-presidential-twitter-accounts-now-biden-administrations-control?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
The Quickest Way to Go from 0 to 3.5 Million Followers?
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding-right:15px;padding-bottom:15px;padding-left:15px;padding-top:0px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Become president. Just before noon yesterday, the @POTUS, @VP, @FLOTUS, @PressSec, and @WhiteHouse accounts <a href="https://variety.com/2021/digital/news/president-biden-potus-twitter-1234887956/?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">changed hands</a> to the Biden administration, while the old accounts from Trump’s time in office began the process of being publicly archived.  </p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>
</span><span><strong style="color:#000">One twist: </strong></span><span>The new administration </span><span><a href="https://www.theverge.com/2020/12/22/22195713/twitter-biden-reset-accounts-trump-potus-whitehouse?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">isn’t inheriting</a></span><span> any followers from 45. Each account listed above was reset to zero yesterday, a departure from how Twitter handled the transition from Obama to Trump in 2017.  </span>
</li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Because the new administration will have to rebuild these accounts’ followings from scratch, the Biden team isn’t happy. The new president’s digital director Rob Flaherty called Twitter’s <a href="https://www.washingtonpost.com/technology/2021/01/20/potus-twitter-account-biden-trump/?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">handling of the transition</a> “profoundly insufficient.” </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Still, they’re off to a strong start. As of last night, the @POTUS account was already up to 3.5 million followers, @VP was sitting at 6.5 million, and the first-ever @SecondGentleman account for Douglas Emhoff, Harris’s husband, had attracted around 840K. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Zoom out:</strong> Biden will almost certainly use Twitter more conventionally than Trump. But the platform is likely to remain a critical tool for communicating government priorities, as it's become for other global leaders.</p>

<div class="c6 " style="margin-bottom:7px">
<!-- <![endif]-->
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
GEOPOLITICS
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/01/20/president-bidens-top-geopolitical-challenge-china?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
Biden's Approach to China
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<!--[if mso]>
<img alt="Biden malarky GIF" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" height=456 src="https://media.giphy.com/media/xUOwGhdl13FVkoWpb2/giphy.gif">
<![endif]-->
<!--[if !mso]>--><!-- -->
<img class="story-header-image" alt="Biden malarky GIF" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" src="https://media.giphy.com/media/xUOwGhdl13FVkoWpb2/giphy.gif">
<!--<![endif]-->
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>Giphy</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">President Biden is facing so many challenges on the homefront, it’s easy to forget the one that lies 7,000 miles away.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">But yesterday, China proved again why it’s the top geopolitical thorn for the US, when it <a href="https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2021-01-20/china-sanctions-pompeo-other-trump-officials-as-his-term-ends?sref=KkPzpZvz&utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">placed sanctions</a> on former Secretary of State Mike Pompeo and 27 other Americans. </p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>On Tuesday, Pompeo declared that China was committing “genocide” against minority Muslim groups in the Xinjiang region, one of a </span><span><a href="https://www.nytimes.com/2021/01/20/world/asia/trump-china-biden.html?smtyp=cur&smid=tw-nytimes&utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">series of moves</a></span><span> the Trump administration made in its last few days to rankle Beijing. </span>
</li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Biden’s team will also take a hard line on China:</p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>During his Senate confirmation hearing Tuesday, Secretary of State nominee Antony Blinken said he agreed with the “genocide” label and argued that the US should restrict business ties with the Xinjiang region. </span></li>
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Treasury Secretary nominee Janet Yellen said China is “clearly our most important strategic competitor.” </span></li>
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>And Biden plans to keep Trump’s tariffs for now. </span></li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Zoom out: </strong>While Biden has pledged to play bad cop with China, he will probably try to do it with a group of allies by his side, rather than adopt Trump’s “go it alone” approach. </p>

<tr>

<img alt="" style="display: inline-block; width: 25px" width="25" src="https://media.sailthru.com/5z8/1k4/4/2/5e865734bf6f7.jpg">

<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">

<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
CONSUMER GOODS
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/01/20/pg-posts-another-great-quarter-pandemic?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
The Cleaning States of America
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<img alt="Washing soap" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL21lZGl1bS9hc3NldC8zNzg1L3dhc2hpbmdfc29hcC5qcGciLCJidWNrZXQiOiJvc2xvLXByb2R1Y3Rpb24iLCJlZGl0cyI6eyJyZXNpemUiOnsid2lkdGgiOjEwMDAsImhlaWdodCI6bnVsbH19fQ==">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>Francis Scialabba</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Americans know how to put on an inauguration. We also know how to scrub a countertop. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">So says consumer goods giant Procter & Gamble, which <a href="https://www.reuters.com/article/us-procter-gamble-results/pandemic-driven-cleaning-routines-boost-pg-sales-forecast-again-idUSKBN29P1ES?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">raised</a> its annual sales forecast for the second time yesterday. P&G owns brands like Bounty, Tide, and Dawn, which all grew in popularity as everyone became more germ-conscious during the pandemic.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">The stats, via P&G: </p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Cleaning and sanitizing has increased 30% compared to pre-Covid levels</span></li>
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Dishwasher cycles: +15%</span></li>
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Air freshener spraying: +20%</span></li>
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>In-home paper towel usage: +15%</span></li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">It all amounted to organic sales growth of 8% last quarter to $19.8 billion. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Will the cleaning boom last? </strong>P&G thinks so. It cited strong growth in China, which has been far more successful than the US in containing the pandemic, as evidence that less coronavirus does not necessarily mean lower demand for its products. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">But P&G stock stayed flat after its announcement, meaning that investors are <a href="https://www.wsj.com/articles/procter-gamble-has-topped-out-for-now-11611155672?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">skeptical</a> we’ll be sanitizing 40x/day post-pandemic.</p>

</li>

<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">

<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
GAMES
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="#" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
Three Headlines and a Lie
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding-right:15px;padding-bottom:15px;padding-left:15px;padding-top:0px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">This week’s crop of headlines might be the most bizarre we’ve ever assembled. Three are from real news stories, but one is just too weird to be true. Can you spot the fake? </p>

<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>"Joe Exotic, with limo waiting outside prison, </span><span><a href="https://nypost.com/2021/01/20/joe-exotic-with-limo-waiting-fails-to-get-trump-pardon/?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">fails</a></span><span> to get Trump pardon"</span>
</li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>"1st preserved </span><span><a href="https://www.livescience.com/first-dinosaur-butthole-found.html?utm_source=twitter&utm_medium=social&utm_campaign=dlvr.it&utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">dinosaur butthole</a></span><span> is 'perfect' and 'unique,' paleontologist says"</span>
</li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>"'Most Lived In' home in America welcomes its </span><span><a href="https://media.giphy.com/media/iHzFB3MU19XFRyyXnQ/giphy.gif?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">100th family</a></span><span> in the last 10 years"</span>
</li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>"Dublin priest </span><span><a href="https://www.thejournal.ie/priest-held-at-gunpoint-1284939-Jan2014/?amp=1&__twitter_impression=true&utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">says</a></span><span> he ‘bored’ two armed burglars out of his home"</span>
</li>
</ol>

Images\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/small\u003e\n\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003ctable width=\"100%\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" border=\"0\" style=\"border-collapse: collapse;\"\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003ctd style=\"padding:15px\"\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eBecause he had a very productive Wednesday. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eJust before noon, former Vice President Joe Biden \u003ca href=\"https://apnews.com/article/joe-biden-inauguration-a01d1ffa7862661914cb92b22e359854?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eshaved\u003c/a\u003e the “former” and “Vice” off that title when he was sworn in as the 46th President of the US. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eFormer Senator Kamala Harris made history as the first-ever woman, African American, and South Asian American to become VP. \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eAfter the ceremony, Biden got \u003ca href=\"https://www.cbsnews.com/news/biden-executive-orders-watch-live-stream-today-2021-01-20/?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eright to work\u003c/a\u003e. And like Hogwarts or a cow’s stomach, his first day was segmented into four parts. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003ch2 style=\"font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0\"\u003eNo. 1: Containing Covid \u003c/h2\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eIn an executive order, Biden mandated mask-wearing and physical distancing in federal buildings, on federal land, and by all federal employees.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eHe also halted former President Trump’s efforts to leave the World Health Organization. \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003ch2 style=\"font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0\"\u003eNo. 2: Containing the economic fallout from Covid \u003c/h2\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eBiden extended a federal moratorium on evictions and asked the relevant agencies to do the same for foreclosures on federally guaranteed mortgages. Americans with student loan debt also won’t owe principal or interest through the end of September. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eSome in Biden’s Democratic Party want him to erase up to $50,000 per person in student debt, but Biden’s team has maintained a goal of canceling up to $10,000. \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eBiden also froze last-minute regulations enacted by Trump so that his administration can evaluate whether they’ll keep them. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003ch2 style=\"font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0\"\u003eNo. 3: Reversing Trump’s policies on immigration \u003c/h2\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eBiden \u003ca href=\"https://www.cbsnews.com/news/biden-executive-orders-watch-live-stream-today-2021-01-20/?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eordered\u003c/a\u003e an end to construction of the border wall while the administration studies its legal status and called on Congress to defend the “Dreamers” program for undocumented Americans, a program Trump targeted. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eBiden also ended the travel ban targeting Muslim-majority countries. \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003eBiden’s broader immigration platform involves creating a \u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://www.latimes.com/california/story/2021-01-20/biden-administration-releases-bill-establishing-pathway-to-citizenship-for-11-million-undocumented-immigrants?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003epath to citizenship\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e for an estimated 11 million people. \u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003ch2 style=\"font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0\"\u003eNo. 4: Combating climate change \u003c/h2\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eBiden signed a letter indicating that the US will rejoin the Paris Agreement, which Trump had pulled out of. He also \u003ca href=\"https://www.nytimes.com/2021/01/20/us/politics/biden-executive-action.html?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003etook action\u003c/a\u003e on other environmental efforts by 1) overturning softer standards on emissions 2) imposing a moratorium on oil and gas leases in the Arctic National Wildlife Refuge and 3) revoking a permit for the Keystone XL pipeline. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eLooking ahead...\u003c/strong\u003ewe see push notifications in your future. White House Press Secretary Jen Psaki said there would be more proclamations over the next 10 days.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003c!-- SOCIAL LINKS --\u003e\n\u003ctable width=\"100%\" cellpadding=\"0\" Followers?\n\u003c/font\u003e\u003c/a\u003e\n\u003c/h1\u003e\n\u003c/td\u003e\n\u003c/tr\u003e\n\u003c/table\u003e\n\u003ctable width=\"100%\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" border=\"0\" style=\"border-collapse: collapse;\"\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003ctd style=\"padding-right:15px;padding-bottom:15px;padding-left:15px;padding-top:0px\"\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eBecome president. Just before noon yesterday, the @POTUS, @VP, @FLOTUS, @PressSec, and @WhiteHouse accounts \u003ca href=\"https://variety.com/2021/digital/news/president-biden-potus-twitter-1234887956/?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003echanged hands\u003c/a\u003e to the Biden administration, while the old accounts from Trump’s time in office began the process of being publicly archived.  \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003e\n\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eOne twist: \u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003eThe new administration \u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://www.theverge.com/2020/12/22/22195713/twitter-biden-reset-accounts-trump-potus-whitehouse?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eisn’t inheriting\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e any followers from 45. Each account listed above was reset to zero yesterday, a departure from how Twitter handled the transition from Obama to Trump in 2017.  \u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eBecause the new administration will have to rebuild these accounts’ followings from scratch, the Biden team isn’t happy. The new president’s digital director Rob Flaherty called Twitter’s \u003ca href=\"https://www.washingtonpost.com/technology/2021/01/20/potus-twitter-account-biden-trump/?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003ehandling of the transition\u003c/a\u003e “profoundly insufficient.” \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eStill, they’re off to a strong start. As of last night, the @POTUS account was already up to 3.5 million followers, @VP was sitting at 6.5 million, and the first-ever @SecondGentleman account for Douglas Emhoff, Harris’s husband, had attracted around 840K. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eZoom out:\u003c/strong\u003e Biden will almost certainly use Twitter more conventionally than Trump. But the platform is likely to remain a critical tool for communicating government priorities, as it's become for other global leaders.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003c!-- SOCIAL LINKS --\u003e\n\u003ctable width=\"100%\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" border=\"0\" style=\"border-collapse: collapse;\"\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003ctd style=\"padding:15px\"\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003ePresident Biden is facing so many challenges on the homefront, it’s easy to forget the one that lies 7,000 miles away.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eBut yesterday, China proved again why it’s the top geopolitical thorn for the US, when it \u003ca href=\"https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2021-01-20/china-sanctions-pompeo-other-trump-officials-as-his-term-ends?sref=KkPzpZvz\u0026utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eplaced sanctions\u003c/a\u003e on former Secretary of State Mike Pompeo and 27 other Americans. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003eOn Tuesday, Pompeo declared that China was committing “genocide” against minority Muslim groups in the Xinjiang region, one of a \u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://www.nytimes.com/2021/01/20/world/asia/trump-china-biden.html?smtyp=cur\u0026smid=tw-nytimes\u0026utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eseries of moves\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e the Trump administration made in its last few days to rankle Beijing. \u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eBiden’s team will also take a hard line on China:\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eDuring his Senate confirmation hearing Tuesday, Secretary of State nominee Antony Blinken said he agreed with the “genocide” label and argued that the US should restrict business ties with the Xinjiang region. \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eTreasury Secretary nominee Janet Yellen said China is “clearly our most important strategic competitor.” \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eAnd Biden plans to keep Trump’s tariffs for now. \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eZoom out: \u003c/strong\u003eWhile Biden has pledged to play bad cop with China, he will probably try to do it with a group of allies by his side, rather than adopt Trump’s “go it alone” P\u0026G owns brands like Bounty, Tide, and Dawn, which all grew in popularity as everyone became more germ-conscious during the pandemic.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eThe stats, via P\u0026G: \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eCleaning and sanitizing has increased 30% compared to pre-Covid levels\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eDishwasher cycles: +15%\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eAir freshener spraying: +20%\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eIn-home paper towel usage: +15%\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eIt all amounted to organic sales growth of 8% last quarter to $19.8 billion. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eWill the cleaning boom last? \u003c/strong\u003eP\u0026G thinks so. It cited strong growth in China, which has been far more successful than the US in containing the pandemic, as evidence that less coronavirus does not necessarily mean lower demand for its products. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eBut P\u0026G stock stayed flat after its announcement, meaning that investors are \u003ca
